snippet.title: 4 Totally Awesome April Fool's Jokes

snippet.title: Thursday, April 3: Today in Gold and Silver
snippet.description:
Thursday, April 3: Today in Gold and Silver
By Casey Research 05:25 AM EDT 04/03/14
The precious metal equities post decent gains. No change in GLD, but a smallish withdrawal from SLV. The U.S. Mint adds another 878,000 silver eagles to March sales. No really big changes in gold and silver stocks at the Comex-approved depositories on Tuesday.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/12614941/1/thursday-april-3-today-in-gold-and-silver.html
